CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: PDTP-DT2BT , PDTP - DTBT and PDTP-BT have optical band gaps of 1.61 , 1.46 and 1.41 eV , respectively , which are close to the ideal value of 1.5 eV for PSC application.

Let's think step by step.

1. PDTP-DT2BT
2. PDTP-DTBT
3. PDTP-BT

These are the Material Names mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PDTP-DT2BT
2. PDTP-DTBT
3. PDTP

These are the Material Names mentioned in the paragraph that are relevant to the context. The "PDTP" is mentioned as a common prefix for all three materials.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP-DT2BT |
| PDTP-DTBT |
| PDTP |

These are the Material Names mentioned in the paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". The entities are presented precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
